name: SpaceNya
description:
Kuviga Studio presents!

SpaceNya

The very first game of Kuviga

Get into the paws of a Astronaut Cat, who has to deliver some important cargo to Mars!

Fight against space junk, protect the cargo, and have fun!

Made by 5 people in over a day

Art: Antonella Fruttero and Viviana Aguirre

Music and Sound Design: Flavio Biamonte

Dialogues: Lucas Perricone

Programming Leandro Ibaceta
